title: Smart Data Models - SubLoadArea
description: Adapted from CIM data models. The class is the second level in a hierarchical structure for grouping of loads for the purpose of load flow load scaling.

type.description: Property. NGSI type. It has to be SubLoadArea

LoadArea.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. The LoadArea where the SubLoadArea belongs. Default: None

LoadGroups.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. The Loadgroups in the SubLoadArea. Default: 'list'
